```{r}
setwd("/Users/pavan/Desktop/Git/6101 project/DS-6101-Final")
music = data.frame(read.csv("music_genre.csv"))
str(music)
```

```{r}
# drop those blank genre values 
music = music[!(music$music_genre == ""),]

```



Prepossessing the Genre Column with dummy variables
```{r}
#genres as binary categorical data
new_genres<-c()
for (i in music$music_genre) 
  {
  if (i=="Electronic")
    new_genres<-append(new_genres,values='e')
  else
    new_genres<-append(new_genres,values='ne')
}
music$new_genres<-new_genres



```

```{r}
music$new_genres = factor(music$new_genres)
music$music_genre = factor(music$music_genre)
music$mode = factor(music$mode)
music$key = factor(music$key)


str(music)
```


```{r}
library(caTools)
trainingRows <- sample(1:nrow(music), 0.7*nrow(music))
training <- music[trainingRows, ]
test <- music[-trainingRows, ]
```



```{r}
library(partykit)
library(rpart)
loadPkg("rpart.plot")
loadPkg("rattle")
library(caret)
library(ISLR)

#binary genres
treefit1<-rpart(new_genres ~ popularity + acousticness + danceability + energy + key +liveness + loudness + mode + speechiness + valence, data=training,method="class", control = list(maxdepth = 4))
fancyRpartPlot(treefit1)

printcp(treefit1)
treefit1<-prune(treefit1, cp=.01)
fancyRpartPlot(treefit1)
#cm = confusionMatrix( predict(treefit2, type = "class"), reference = music$music_genre[,"Genre"] )

```

```{r}
#non-binary genres
treefit2<-rpart(music_genre ~ popularity + acousticness + danceability + energy + key +liveness + loudness + mode + speechiness + valence, data=training, method="class", control = list(maxdepth = 4))
fancyRpartPlot(treefit2)

printcp(treefit2)
treefit2<-prune(treefit2, cp=0.01)
fancyRpartPlot(treefit2)
#cm = confusionMatrix( predict(treefit2, type = "class"), reference = music$music_genre[,"Genre"] )

```


```{r, results = 'markup'}
loadPkg("rpart")

set.seed(1)
treefit <- rpart(mode ~ key + music_genre +liveness, data=music, method="class", control = list(maxdepth = 15) )
summary(treefit)
plot(treefit, uniform=TRUE, main="Classification Tree")

loadPkg("rattle")
fancyRpartPlot(treefit)


```
